reviews.title: very dissapointed,and not worth the money waisted
reviews.text: what a dissapointment, very tired looking hotel, needs updating and though cleaning was ongoing so was the fumigations, hotel food very sad, drinks got very sickening, had some rude bar staff, didnt feel welcomed, needed to get hold of 24 hr rep line one night because of illness, spent hrs tring to get through and never did, they tell you ,you shouldn,t leave the complex without a guide as its not safe, so you get ripped off by having to pay for taxi,s everytime you feel you want to explore, shopping plaza was a joke, all selling same thing, rubbish, expect to pay high prices for everything, including the sellers on the beach,,, things cheaper back home, as for toiletries ,dont forget any, as you can pay up to 8 pounds for shampoo in complex shops, where shop staff tend to follow you around, and thanks to all the football fans from britton who spoilt the holiday, you know who you are by getting drunk and kicking off most nights, loads of fight and arguments occured,,, and how tacky to hang all you football flags for the duration of your stay, made the hotel look so untidy and naff, never go back to this hotel of dominica republic again, entertainment sends you mad over the two weeks there as so boring even though they try hard,,, trips are so expensive to go on, so take plenty of cash, did enjoy quads though,,,, each to their own hope you all enjoy your stay...

reviews.title: Fantastic All Round
reviews.text: I have recently returned from the holiday of a life time..

Before we travelled we read some pretty bad reviews on the hotel, but soon realised that they were false! food was lovely even a choice of a la cate during our stay.Would advise to take a pack of cards as the entertainment isnt amazing! all staff are friendly,helpfull.
reviews.title: best holiday i have ever had
A good time had by all
reviews.text: children will need to be supervised when the rain falls as it can be quite dangerous with the slippy falls.(as well as adults on a night out!)shopping is expected but walk further down the beach and you will find a very small market with all you want for 5 times cheaper than at the plaza.Book some tours with the hotel as it is much safer.

reviews.title: a lovely hotel
reviews.text: All in All BRILL HOLIDAY

reviews.title: Just Fantastic
reviews.text: We have just spent two weeks at the Gran Ventana Beech Resort for our Honeymoon and what can we say. We had a fantastic time and would certainly go back in the future either with or without children.

reviews.title: Top honeymoon
reviews.text: The hotel was comfortable and very clean, towels and bedding changed every day. There are plenty of facilities at this hotel tennis, swimming and pool activities to name a few. The staff in the resturants, bars, shops and reception were all very friendly, attentative and spoke very good English.

reviews.title: fabulous hotel
reviews.text: The food in all four of the resturants was lovely with plenty of choice for everyone.
The beech was just stunning the water very clear perfect for snorkelling and going out on a jet ski.
reviews.title: Amazing!!!

reviews.text: There are plenty of trips available for all ages and abilities which you can book through the tour operator or from the guides at the plaza shopping centre both were fine.
reviews.title: Promises so much, delivers too little

reviews.text: went to gran ventana 4th oct-18th oct....well what can i say!this hotel is the best, worth every penny .the service is great, the staff cant do enough for you, always on the go. especially the amination guys and gals. plenty of food and drink. went on the dominican discovery worth every penny seeing the dominican life in villages and all those children, we gave them candy....the tour guy was brill too. the beach is great and relaxing the best beach ive seen. we are coming back in june to have our paradise wedding there!!
reviews.title: brill hotel
Best Holiday Ever
reviews.text: looking forward to it

My husband and I have just returned from 2 weeks honeymoon at the Gran Ventana and I have to say we had a fantastic time. The beauty of this hotel is there are 2 parts to it -a quiet part with quiet pool and quiet bar for those who want peace and relaxation and then there is the more lively part with a lively pool if you are feeling in a party mood and wanting to get involved in all the activities. This is also where the night time entertainment takes place which was brill. There was something different on every night. The entertainment team are fantastic and we gave them all nicknames as you tend do when you can't pronounce their real names - see if you can spot Norman Wisdom who also answers to the name of Lewis.
reviews.title: Loved the Ventana
Holiday of a lifetime!
reviews.text: The food for me was one of the highlights of our holiday - the choice and quality was superb and to suite all tastes. They also have 3 a la carte restaurants which are excellent so you must try them out.

reviews.title: great holiday
reviews.text: I had read reports of illness before we went out there but neither me or my husband became ill while we were there and we didn't hear reports from any of the other guests either. The hotel is spotlessly clean in fact they never stop cleaning.
I went to this wonderful hotel in February 2005, during my school's study break. I was 19 years old at the time, and my boy-friend was 20. And let me tell you that we had the time of our lives!
reviews.title: Greatest hotel! Had the time of my life!

reviews.text: To begin with, the prices are very affordable and the hotel is fantastic. The staff is always willing to help you, and they seem to enjoy tourists' company. They are young, fun and extremely helpful.
reviews.title: Reasonable Hotel. Good but not great experience
Life is all about Experiances
reviews.text: Second, the beach is gorgeous. I have travelled in the past, and have been to various vacation resorts. The water is not turquoise and the sand is not white like flour (if you are aiming for that, than don't go there). The beach is, instead, golden and the water is dark aqua. It is simply stunning! My boy-friend really enjoyed it, considering it was his very first time in the South. The hotel is located on the famous "Playa Dorada" beach. It measures nearly 4 kilometers long. You can walk for hours...

Third, the very best thing at this hotel is the fact that it has its own enormous coral reef. Other hotels organize trips to the Gran Ventana, in order for their customers to see our coral reef. It is located right in front of the hotel (beach side), you stimply grap a pair of "goggles" at the kiosk on the beach and go. It is stunning! I have seen huge purple fishes, the size of my head, lol! Kids will enjoy it!
reviews.title: We returned for a 2nd time still love it !

reviews.text: Fourth, the food is great. Forget what other people say, I have eaten everything, from vegetables to meat. There is no way you can get sick. In fact, no one we had met at this hotel had gotten sick. The meals are great. They are diversified; you will not be eating the same thing all week. It is varied and delicious.
reviews.title: Suprisingly good!
